idea:
⊷

At Bokoto Enterprises we believe in the policy

of You Grow We Grow Truly lasting and

impactful progress can be made only if we step

together towards a promising future

⊷

When Responsibility and Care are synonymous,

development is inevitable We understand the

need to preserve what our planet so generously

bestowed upon us

⊷

We like to create holistic and pragmatic

solutions

⊷

As  a step towards carbon neutrality and 

ecological sustainability, we henceforth

declare, to recycle the amount of polyethylene

terephthalate bottles that we put into the

market in the form of product containers

⊷

T o be cognizant to our responsibility towards the 

society, we pledge wherein to donate a Re 1 per Litre

of our product that is sold in the market This

donation will be directed towards Organizations

elevating the ‘specially abled’ population by

providing education and vocational skills.
name: BOKOTO ENTERPRISES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
NorthStar Innovations is a startup by Alumni of KJ Somaiya College of Engineering which handles all the software development challenges for clients, by providing the brightest solutions to all their application development problems.

NorthStar specialize in helping entrepreneurs and businesses to transform their idea into a product so that they can concentrate on other important stuff without taking the stress of coding!

idea: Harns Technologies is  in the field of process digitization with a target set on simplifying business processes in the most effective and efficient manner that allows our clients to focus their attention towards the aspects of their business that are most crucial. We use the latest technologies and our solutions rewrite the very basis in which business is conducted. Not only is our prowess in technological solutions wide and far reaching in terms of the different kinds of solutions that we provide, but is also deep as we explore possibilities and problem areas by diving into them and examining them from their roots and addressing them from their core and then moving outwards. Harns Technologies ML and AI solutions have bridged gaps in processes that have been overlooked even by veterans and this has allowed our clients to race forward and leave their competitors in the dust. Technology is an ever changing landscape and we are abreast with these changes and capitalize on opportunities that present themselves so as to upgrade the processes followed by our clients so that they are always the best version of themselves. As Charles Darwin said “ It’s not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent that survives. It is the one that is most adaptable to change
name: HARNS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Company has been formed by group of professionals having vivid experience & wide exposure in information technology. People involved here are young professionals. The resource personnel working in the company have been consistently providing reliable support services & consultancy to wide verity of corporates. It is a company where professionals from both technical & functional field  group together with an objective of providing appropriate business solution. We want to establish ourselves as the best choice in the computing & information technology services, consultancy & development by offering the full spectrum of services. We are newly established progressive company. We have domain knowledge of 20+ years of  experience in the field of information technology & IT infrastructure. Our experience team is ready to help you to choose the write solution for your company. We can help you every step of the way, from initial selection, to vendor selection, negotiation, and implementation. We provide full services to help manage and execute your project on time and on budget. 

Bottom-line of the company philosophy is building a long term business partnership with its clientwhere interpersonal relationship, reliability, assure quality & target oriented modern technology are the major building blocks.
name: MAXTECH INFOSOLUTION
